name: Life After Us: Fading Light
description:
“All at once, however, my attention was fixed with a start as I fancied that I heard the sound of soft approching steps on the rocky floor of the cavern"

Life After Us is a series of short horror games based in a universe inspired by the stories of Edgar Allan Poe and HP Lovecraft.

Fading Light, the third in the series sees you, a man who wanders from a tour group in a cave only to fall into the depths of a long forgotten part of the caverns which are home to more than just the darkness.
